author: etan_status
content: There is a discussion about EIP-6404 happening in <#595701195843174434>

author: etan_status
content:
– EIP-6404 (transactions): Removed the redundant `chain_id` entry, it is already mixed into tx signatures, so is not needed to make `transactions_root` globally unique
– EIP-6466 (receipts): Flattened the receipt structure to avoid unnecessary nesting. Added `cumulative_data_gas_used`.
– EIP-6465 (withdrawals): Cleanups
